lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a speech prepared for delivery in New York to the Bank and Financial Analysts' Association, Heller said, "I believe that increased diversification along geographic and product lines is the key to strengthening the American banking system."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Heller said that would mean "the steady decline of America's banks in the world financial league tables would be arrested" by permitting them to become more competitive.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Limits would be placed on the extension of credit by the bank to the associated institutions, and all transactions would have to be on an arms-length basis," Heller said.
